thread.title: Delphine Horvilleur: “Since October 7, I have been insulted on social networks. My sympathy quota has collapsed." - The Limited Times
thread.title_full: Delphine Horvilleur: “Since October 7, I have been insulted on social networks. My sympathy quota has collapsed." - The Limited Times

author: Anonym
title: Delphine Horvilleur: “Since October 7, I have been insulted on social networks. My sympathy quota has collapsed." - The Limited Times
text:
She is the most listened to voice of liberal Judaism in France.
For fifteen years, she has embodied universalism, feminism, love of otherness and interfaith dialogue at the Beaugrenelle synagogue and in the media.
In 2019, she published
Reflections on the Anti-Semitic Question
and warned, “let’s not reverse the chain of responsibility.
Jews are never responsible for anti-Semitism.”
In 2021, his book
Living with Our Dead
consoled tens of thousands of readers.
Delphine Horvilleur had not planned to write a book in the year 2023.
Oy a brokh!
*
But the barbarity of Hamas' terrorist acts perpetrated in Israel on October 7, "ghost images of the Shoah", the explosion of anti-Semitic acts in France and the polarization of the debate have torn Delphine Horvilleur out of
Comment ça va pas
?,
short and dense book which reaffirms the virtues of dialogue and explores some key facts, figures and moments of its existence.
Where he…
